item.title: KOS
item.description: score:-86 Chances: Kosmos Energy has a strong exploration and production portfolio, with assets in offshore Ghana, Equatorial Guinea, U.S. Gulf of Mexico, and Mauritania and Senegal. The company maintains a sustainable exploration program, balancing between proven basin infrastructure-led exploration, emerging basins, and frontier basins.
